description: {"blocks":[{"key":"ep42l","text":"M9 minimal medium is a classical bacterial growth broth (Miller, et al., 1972) characterized by its low autofluorescence. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5dv8h","text":"As it is minimal, it can be supplemented with defined carbon sources or amino acids acord the custom experimental setups.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rr9e","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ah4ni","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
